DOC.brief_title: A Study Endostar Combined With Chemotherapy Treatment Osteosarcoma
DOC.criteria: Patients histologically confirm osteosarcoma , evidence metastasis At least one measurable lesion Life expectancy > 3 month ECOG performance status 02 Adequate hematologic , cardiac , renal , hepatic function Patients prior chemotherapy least 4 week clearance period enter study Evidence metastasis Serious infection Evidence bleed diathesis Significant cardiovascular disease Pregnant lactate woman Allergic E.coli preparation
